space.arim.api.chat

Interface MessageBuilder

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JsonMessageBuilder, Message.JsonBuilder, Message.SimpleBuilder, SimpleMessageBuilder

    public interface MessageBuilder
    Contains common documentation for SimpleMessageBuilder and JsonMessageBuilder
    Author:
    A248

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MessageBuilder add(String text)
      Adds the given text, carrying over previous colouring and formatting.
      MessageBuilder append(Component... components)
      Adds more Components
      MessageBuilder append(Component component)
      Adds another Component
      Message build()
      Builds into a fresh Message
      MessageBuilder colour(Colour colour)
      Sets the colour of any future content added with add(String)
      MessageBuilder reset()
      Resets all formatting established.
      MessageBuilder style(Style style)
      Adds the specified style for any future content
      default MessageBuilder style(Style style, boolean enable)
      Enables the style if specified, otherwise, disables the style.
      MessageBuilder unstyle(Style style)
      Removes the specified style for any future content

    • Method Detail

        Adds another Component
        Parameters:
        component - the next component
        Returns:

      • append

        MessageBuilder append(Component... components)
        Adds more Components
        Parameters:
        components - the next components
        Returns:
        the builder

      • reset

        MessageBuilder reset()
        Resets all formatting established.
        Any text following with add(String) will be unformatted.
        Returns:
        the builder

      • add

        MessageBuilder add(String text)
        Adds the given text, carrying over previous colouring and formatting.
        To reset formatting, use reset()
        Parameters:
        text - the content to add
        Returns:
        the builder

      • colour

        MessageBuilder colour(Colour colour)
        Sets the colour of any future content added with add(String)
        Parameters:
        colour - the colour for following text
        Returns:
        the builder

      • style

        MessageBuilder style(Style style)
        Adds the specified style for any future content
        Parameters:
        style - the style for following text
        Returns:
        the builder

      • style

        default MessageBuilder style(Style style,
                             boolean enable)
        Enables the style if specified, otherwise, disables the style.
        Parameters:
        style - the style
        enable - whether to toggle the style on or off
        Returns:
        the builder

      • unstyle

        MessageBuilder unstyle(Style style)
        Removes the specified style for any future content
        Parameters:
        style - the style to remove for following text
        Returns:
        the builder

      • build

        Message build()
        Builds into a fresh Message
        Returns:
        a formed Message
